spanGrp.span: ‘In order to cook chicken we have to get a chicken;
Óshkoro eliwã-glö-sã' je ra óshkoro guge-gẽ-wã
we break its neck with our hands;
you put it in boiling water;
óshkoro diglö bal í ke-gẽ-ka óshkoro kwö tke-gẽũ-mĩ
we peal it and take off its guts.
Then if we have plantains and manioc at home,
Tara ñe ra chomõ (_) shkö (_) kajali se të jũ nã ra
we peal it and put it in boiling water.
je wa (_) kwö tke-gẽũ-mĩ diglö bal ke-gẽ-ka
and put into a pot with manioc, plantains and annatto.
óshkoro jie-gẽ-wã olla nã shkö chomõ ra kachayega ra
You blow the fire till it cooks.’
tara (_) yuköwö jũẽ-gẽ í diginã të í elir-sã' ska
